name: ai-sdk-guardrails-monorepo
description: AI SDK Guardrails monorepo - Production-ready guardrails for AI SDK applications
author: Jag Reehal<jag@jagreehal.com> (https://jagreehal.com)

scripts.ci: pnpm build && pnpm format:check && pnpm check-exports && pnpm lint && pnpm test
scripts.quality: pnpm lint && pnpm type-check && pnpm test && pnpm format && pnpm check-exports
scripts.local-release: pnpm build && pnpm format:check && pnpm check-exports && pnpm lint && pnpm test && changeset version && changeset publish
